name: Crossfire: Alt-Space
description:
You don't know why you're here, but you know it's important...

Fight your way through waves of enemies while swapping between Alt-Space and M-Space. Once swapped, you are immune to everything happening in the alternate dimension. Make your way through the cold unforgiving vacuum of space, and reach service stations where you can purchase upgrades and take a load off.

  • Phase Shifting Action!
  • Interdimensional Interactions.
  • Dark Matter!

MUSIC - Maile Pacumio

SOUND - Graham Sanders

ART - India Wishart (lead), Lucas Escobar, Eman Payne

PROGRAMMING - Daniel Walls, James Maron, Dominic Griffith

WRITING - Karmen Hays

Created for the 2022 GGJ in 48 hours.
